verses.text: \w This|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*, ‘\w Sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w set|strong="H7896"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* neck \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* foes.’

\w On|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* wielding \w your|strong="H3068"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H5797"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* charges \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* \w over|strong="H7287"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* foes \w that|strong="H3068"\w* surround \w you|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* march \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w battle|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* follow \w you|strong="H3117"\w* gladly \w young|strong="H3117"\w* \w warriors|strong="H2428"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w array|strong="H1926"\w*, \w like|strong="H3117"\w* dew-drops, born \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w morning|strong="H4891"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w repent|strong="H5162"\w*, ‘\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w Melchizedek|strong="H4442"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w*.’

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w side|strong="H3225"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3225"\+w*\nd* \w shatter|strong="H4272"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wrath.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w execute|strong="H1777"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1777"\w* \w filling|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* valleys \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w dead|strong="H1472"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w broad|strong="H7227"\w* fields \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w shattered|strong="H4272"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H5158"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* march onward \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w uplifted|strong="H7311"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.
